GSP29vytrkt1u:6597_0: nirvikalpeke sādhakābhāvamātraṃ na bādhakaṃ cāstītyāha -- kiñceti // yogyeti // yadyatra
GSP29vytrkt1u:6603: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva nirvikalpakābhāve liṅgam / nirvikalpake sati savikalpakāvaśyaṃbhāvābhāvena nirvikalpakaṃ prati savikalpakasyā vyāpakatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6604: api ca nirvikalpakajanyasavikalpakotpattidaśāyā 1 matī 2 ndriyanirvakalpakasāmagrīsatvena satpratipakṣavatsāmagrīdvayasya parasparapratibandhakamapi jñānaṃ notpadyata //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6606_1: parāmarśena gṛhyamāṇo ghaṭādyabhāvotra ghaṭo nāsti yogyatve satyanupalabhyamānatvāditi
GSP29vytrkt1u:6607: na ca savikalpakābhāva eva ghaṭādyabhāvabuddhau liṅgamastu savikalpakasya yogyatayā tadabhāvajñānasaṃbhavāditi vācyam / upalabdhisāmānyābhāvasyaivārthābhāve
GSP29vytrkt1u:6609_2: ca prataykṣādityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti // savikalpakāvaśyaṃbhāvāveneti // nirvikalpakamātraṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6610_0: bādhakāntaramāha -- api ceti // savikalpakadaśāyāṃ nirvikalpakasāmagryeva nāsti nirvikalpakābhāvasahakṛtendriyasaṃyogādereva
GSP29vytrkt1u:6610_1: nirvikalpakasāmagrītvādevaṃ ca noktadoṣa iti bhāvenāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ca pūrveti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6612: 1.itaḥ ' na ca pūrva' ityantaṃ nāsti. atra 'mapi indriya sannikarṣarūpa' ityasti -cha-ga. 2.mapīndriyasannikarṣarūpanirvi -ka-mu-rā.
GSP29vytrkt1u:6616: na ta pūrvanirvikalpakamevottaranirvikalpakapratibandhakam / dhārāvāhikasākṣātkāradarśanena tvatpakṣepi pratyakṣasthale siddheḥ siddhyantarāpratibandhakatvāt //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6617_0: na ca samūhālambana 1 vat sāmagryā 2 dārthasamājādekaṃ jñānamastīti vācyam / tadvidiha
GSP29vytrkt1u:6617_1: phalāvirodhābhāvāt / na hi saṃbhavatyevameva jñānamekasminneva ghaṭe ghaṭatvaprakārakaṃ
GSP29vytrkt1u:6618: api ca daṇḍapuru 4 ṣobhayasannikarṣe sati daṇḍadaṇḍatvobhayanirvikalpakānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭa 5 puruṣadhīḥ syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6620_1: anekagocaramekaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate na tu pratibandha evamastvityarthaḥ / virodhaṃ vyanakti -- na hīti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6621: nanu smṛtisāmagrītonubhavasāmagryā ivānumitisāmagrītaḥ pratyakṣasamāmagryā iva ca nirvikalpakasyaivotpattirityastvityato doṣāntaramāha -- api ceti // mutpiṇḍeti
GSP29vytrkt1u:6629: na hi daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣānantaraṃ daṇḍe daṇḍatvavaiśiṣṭyajñānātpūrvaṃ muṇḍitadaṇḍaviśiṣṭapuruṣajñānamanubhūyate / na cedamapi
GSP29vytrkt1u:6630: jñānamatīndriyam / savikalpakatvāt / mama tu indriyasannikarṣādādāveva viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyajñānotpatternāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6631: kiñca daṇḍapuruṣasannikarṣe 1 tadubhayasvarūpamātraviṣayakanirvikalpakavat sambandhasyāpi sannikarṣe 2 tatsvarūpamātraviṣayakaṃ nirvikalpakamapi kasmānna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt1u:6634_2: 4 vannyāyamate 5 viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyadhīrastvityata āha -- kiñca daṇḍapuruṣeti // sannikarṣeṇeti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6635_0: nanu sambandhabhāne sannikarṣamātraṃ na hetuḥ / kiṃ tu sambandhijñānamapīti cet na /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6641_0: api cāsya nirvikalpakajatīyasya jñānakāryaṃ vyāvahāraṃ saṃskāraṃ icchādikaṃ ca kadāpyajanayato
GSP29vytrkt1u:6641_1: na jñānatvaṃ yuktam / natarāṃ cāsya svaṣaye kadāpi saṃśayādyavirodhino niścayatvam /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6641_2: natamāṃ cāsya svaviṣayasiddhimakurvataḥ pramātvam / na ca nirvikalpakena kasyacidapi
GSP29vytrkt1u:6641_3: vastutaḥ kadāpi siddhirdṛṣṭā / na ca 1 pramābhramavijātīyaṃ jñānamasti //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6642: api caivaṃ nirvikalpakajñānaṃ pratyakṣaviśeṣavat anumitiviśeṣopi syāt /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6644_0: abhyupetya vā doṣāntaramāha -- api cāsyeti // kvacitkāryājananepi nirvikalpakāntare
GSP29vytrkt1u:6645_0: siddhimakurvata ityetavdyanakti -- na ceti // nanvīśvarajñānamiva nirvikalpakamapi
GSP29vytrkt1u:6645_1: pramābhramavijātīyajñānamanitya 2 mityata āha -- na ceti // tathātve ghaṭādirapi
GSP29vytrkt1u:6646_0: yadapi“pratyakṣaṃ dvividhaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ savikalpakaṃ ce“ti maṇyādau pratyakṣa 3
GSP29vytrkt1u:6646_1: tvakathanaṃ tadapyayuktamityāha -- api caivamiti // sākṣātkārakāryamakurvatopi pratyakṣajñānaviśeṣatvenumitikāryamakurvatopyanumitiviśeṣatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt1u:6652: nirvikalpakābhāve tu jñānatvāśrayo na savikalpakatvāvacchinnibhinnaḥ jñānatvāt daṇḍīti jñānavat,
GSP29vytrkt1u:6656: etadevābhipretyoktaṃ paddhatau“dravyādivikalpānāṃ prathamamevotpattau bādhakābhāvena 4 nirvikalpakā 5 nupapatteḥ“iti /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6658_0: pramāṇaviruddhaṃ ca nirvikalpakamiti bhāvenāha -- nirvikalpakābhāve tviti // ityādidraṣṭavyamityuttareṇānvayaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt1u:6658_1: etena nirvikalpakābhāve mānābhāvādeva nirvikalpasiddhiriti nirastam / savikalpakasyāpi
GSP29vytrkt1u:6666_1: pūrvamabhāne viśiṣṭajñāne prakāratvānupapattirūpasya sambandhijñānaṃ vinā sambandhajñānānupapatyādirūpasya
GSP29vytrkt1u:6675: upalakṣaṇaṃ caitaditi // bādhakābhāvenetyetadbhādhakabhāvenetyasyāpyupalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ / tadevaṃ vyanakti-- pratyuteti // bhaṅgadvayārthamupasaṃharati -- tasmāditi //
